question: Who was awarded the "best goalkeeper" in the 2018 FIFA Football World Cup?
explanation: Thibaut Courtois was awarded the "best goalkeeper" in the 2018 FIFA Football World Cup. The 2018 FIFA World Cup was an international football tournament contested by men's national teams and took place between 14 June and 15 July 2018 in Russia. It was the 21st FIFA World Cup.
